title: A Talk with Téa
description:
Téa Smith is a fellow YouTube friend of mine with a background in internet marketing, and has been involved with social media, chat rooms etc since the early days. We chat about her internet adventures including going viral, and becoming friends with singer Lisa Loeb

Follow Téa on twitter @tealou and on her youtube channel 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6ydxuu0_ku9SBFWl7uArLw
